UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Communications, Advocacy And Public Engagement, Community Engagement, Social And Behaviour Change, Data, Research, Evaluation And Knowledge Management, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Al 2025, las y los adolescentes, especialmente aquellos que viven en mayores condiciones de vulnerabilidad, lograrÃ¡n concluir el nivel secundario de educaciÃ³n y sus conocimientos fundamentales, transferibles y digitales habrÃ¡n mejorado tomarÃ¡n decisiones informadas y autÃ³nomas sobre su salud y sexualidad, contarÃ¡n con el apoyo requerido para hacerlo y, tomarÃ¡n parte activa de las decisiones que les afectan.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Al 2025, las organizaciones y lideres juveniles, la sociedad civil y el sector privado han mejorado sus capacidades para concurrircon organismos publicos y desarrollar politicas y herramientas para que los y las adolescentes, especialmente aquellos encondiciones de mayor vulnerabilidad, sean escuchados, esten informados y agencien los asuntos que les afectan en su entorno, lacomunidad donde viven y en la sociedad.

description.narrative: In 2021, UNICEF promoted initiatives and campaigns for adolescents to exercise their right to active participation in the issues that affect them, with a special focus on climate change and digital citizenship, in a context of digital hyperconnection deepened by the pandemic, motivating them and giving them tools to talk about mental health and online risks, among other concerns related to their well-being. At the same time, UNICEF worked with youth organizations and leaders to make visible issues that affect them, focusing on Climate Change and the impact it has on their present and future lives. | Status:Met | As-of Date:14/01/2022
